creator: junzone@yahoo.com
text:
I have trouble with setDisplayGridlines(). I'm using the recommended 2.0-pre3 
version of POI but when I tried running it gives me exception errors. Have any 
one successful installed and run it ? can i have a piece of the codes? thanks

Regards
Helpless

creator: josh@apache.org
text: This was fixed before 2.0-RC1 (Aug 2003 svn r353305) perhaps due to bug 16636.
